subject.normal: [jira] Created: (MAVEN-1274) Documentation generated by maven-plugins has unnecessary 'Maven' on the plugins page

body.para: A new issue has been created in JIRA.

Here is an overview of the issue: --------------------------------------------------------------------- Key: MAVEN-1274 Summary: Documentation generated by maven-plugins has unnecessary 'Maven' on the
plugins page Type: Improvement
Original Estimate: Unknown Time Spent: Unknown Remaining: Unknown
Project: maven Components: documentation Fix Fors: 1.0-rc3 Versions: 1.0-rc3
Created: Sun, 9 May 2004 9:42 AM Updated: Sun, 9 May 2004 9:42 AM
The come from the project name in the multiproject plugin.

I'm all for removing the 'Maven' from the project name in all plugins. After
all, that's what the groupId is for.

While we're at it, we should think about removing the useless 'plugin' on the
end of the name too
